rooms.description: Spacious living room with Chettinad-style decor, incorporating traditional wood and stone finishes.
Cultural dining space complementing the living room, with ornate detailing.
Functional kitchen area designed in a modern yet traditional style; includes ample storage.
Essential ground floor bathroom placed conveniently near the living and dining areas.
A dedicated home theater area with proper acoustics and seating arrangements for entertainment.

openings.description: Main entrance designed according to Vastu principles, ensuring energy flow.
Large windows for natural light and ventilation as per traditional architectural norms.

levels.notes: Design adheres to Vastu principles by placing the entrance in the north-east direction, ensuring positive energy flow. The layout also incorporates Chettinad style elements including ornamental woodwork, stone detailing, and intricate carvings in the living areas.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with attached private bathroom and walk-in closet, offering tranquility and privacy.
First additional bedroom designed for guest use or family member.
Second additional bedroom, maintaining the Chettinad style with modern amenities.
Third additional bedroom designed for flexibility and comfort.
Dedicated private gym area featuring modern equipment, soundproofing, and ventilation.

openings.description: Balcony providing a view and fresh air, in line with Vastu recommendations for open spaces.

levels.notes: The first floor layout emphasizes privacy and comfort. Bedrooms are arranged to ensure minimal disturbances and incorporate traditional design elements alongside modern comforts. The private gym is located on this floor to minimize noise disruptions.
